Posts.Content: Apr 29, 2012 06:23AM DeeLew84 wrote: I was diagnosed at age 44, with stage 1, grade 2 ILC. I had a bilateral mastectomy. My score came back 17. My oncologist had said that he would recommend chemo if the score was 18 or above. He felt that there would be no real benefit to chemo so I am taking Tamoxifen.Â
